snippet: The international bobsled debut of Olympic hurdler Lolo Jones will come at the sport’s highest level: the World Cup circuit.
abstract: Olympic hurdler Lolo Jones is selected to compete for the United States in bobsled World Cup opener at Lake Placid, NY.
lead_paragraph: The international bobsled debut of Olympic hurdler Lolo Jones will come at the sport’s highest level: the World Cup circuit.

headline.main: Jones’s Debut to Come at Bobsled’s Top Event
